summary: A documentary about the Israeli-Palestinian conflict that has lasted for more than 50 years. Contains some interviews with the children in this conflict.
cast: John Pilger|Fatima Abed-Rabo|Amjad Abu Laban|Mustafa Barghouthi|Khaled Dahlan|Moshe Dam|Rami Elhanan|Mona Al Fasra|Dori Gold|Lama Hourami|Khalid Idis|Ilan Pappe|David Reisch|Ihay Rosen-Zvi
title: Palestina todavía es la cuestión
